title: Football Watch Face
summary: Show the ultimate support for your football team from your wrist!
description: Football Watch Face is the best way to show support for your favourite football team while also living out your dream of having your name on the shirt!Football Watch Face FeaturesCustomisable Shirt Name Put your name on the watch face or maybe your favourite football player? Why not put that club legend on there that you've always loved?!All teams from EURO 2016!To select an international team simply long click the international team name.Lots of English Football League TeamsEnglish league football teams up to the third division are included.Request a TeamIf your football team is missing use the "Request Team" button and I'll get your team in ASAP.If you can't find your football team through lists then please let me know and I will help you. Some football team names have had to be changed due to potential licensing issues.If you have any questions then please get in contact:• Email greenglovesdev@gmail.com• Tweet @footballwface• Post on the Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/footballwatchface/
descriptionHTML:
Football Watch Face is the best way to show support for your favourite football team while also living out your dream of having your name on the shirt!

Football Watch Face Features

Customisable Shirt Name
Put your name on the watch face or maybe your favourite football player? Why not put that club legend on there that you've always loved?!

All teams from EURO 2016!
To select an international team simply long click the international team name.

Lots of English Football League Teams
English league football teams up to the third division are included.

Request a Team
If your football team is missing use the "Request Team" button and I'll get your team in ASAP.

If you can't find your football team through lists then please let me know and I will help you. Some football team names have had to be changed due to potential licensing issues.

If you have any questions then please get in contact:

• Email greenglovesdev@gmail.com
• Tweet @footballwface
• Post on the Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/footballwatchface/
comments: Load of rubbish I installed the app on my phone unable to pick name or team a complete con and a waste of money. If possible I would have given it 0 stars :(    I'm using a Sony Smartwatch 3 :)
Great Watch Face Looks really good and developer is very quick with response and gets requests completed quickly.  Great job!
recentChanges: Please join other football fans enjoying Football Watch Face and give us a review, we'd really appreciate it!
- Fix issue where text for dialog button was white instead of black
- Promotion and relegation update to English leagues
- Promotion and relegation update to English leagues
